ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Thank you so much for clearing that up.   I was really starting to get a little concerned as a greater lightstone is a quest item for a monk. I do have a
ygData.messageBody:
Thank you so much for clearing that up. I was really starting to get a
little concerned as a greater lightstone is a quest item for a monk.

I do have a cleric also and have really enjoyed and appreciated very much
the advice and information that the elders have passed down to us young ones
coming up yet.

Thanks again,
Walt

> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> Actually, they put in burned out ones only for the ones that used to not
> have any loot. They did this to avoid people only hunting the ones that
> glow. You still get lightstones and greater lightstones in the same
> frequency, but now they all glow so you can't tell which are carrying the
> good ones.
>
> Astur, Cleric of Brell
> Solusek Ro
>
>
> > From: Mystik <mystik@...>
> >
> > that's a really good idea, but getting the lightstones now is a
> > bust...they took
> > out looting lightstones and glightstones a while back with a
> > path...now you get
> > a burned out lightstone or a nosave lightstone...pretty much
> > worthless....if you
> > had one before the patch, you still have it...<have one on both
> > my toons> but
> > you can no longer loot em...you still get money off the wisps
> > tho....just root
> > and blast...doesn't always work, but it sure does help....if you
> > need help, get
> > a warrior with a combine (; they take the hits, and you can just blast
> > away...what i did...(:
>
>
